Comment 4: 
We aren't going to change the API for this before Go 1, and I'm skeptical it's warranted
after that. Using reflect is already fairly verbose; I don't think it's compelling to be
able to remove a parameter when the programmer can just duplicate it.

This is now fixed, in the sense that the code panics if you do call reflect.MakeSlice
incorrectly. That's how the rest of reflect works.
